attributes.additional_details: Young drivers and new drivers  pay thousands for insurance when driving tests are harder than ever before. Examiners and instructors are being pushed to make better drivers as the government wanted to lower accidents. If the drivers that pass are at a higher standard than previous generations, then why are they paying so much for insurance. A cap is needed to stop insurance companies taking advantage of teenagers and young adults and new drivers
attributes.background: Cheaper car insurance for new drivers and young drivers

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580094
